org.xbill.DNS
Class Credibility

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.xbill.DNS.Credibility
public final class Credibility
extends Object

Constants relating to the credibility of cached data, which is based on the data's source. Data with credibility of 2 or greater is considered credible.

See Also:
Cache, Section
